attributes.action: publicly recognise the efforts of Joanna Lumley on behalf of the Gurkhas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna Lumley has fought superbly for the Gurkhas in the face of considerable Government intransigence and stupidity. Her efforts should be suitably acknowledged.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
